item.title: ‘A Public-Shaming Penalty’: Appeals Court Strikes Down NASDAQ Corporate Board Diversity Rules
item.description: A major court victory for keeping power constrained by law and woke capital focused on capital, not wokeness.

item.title: The Musk Factor
item.description: Musk brings a boundless optimism and can-do verve, and he’s a healthy new ingredient to Trump’s populist mix.

item.title: Eight Antitrust Reform Ideas for the Republican Trifecta
item.description: As with other areas of the law, the Biden-Harris administration routinely weaponized antitrust enforcement to pick economic winners and losers.
